snippet: In Davey Johnson’s quest to lead the Washington Nationals to a championship in his last season as a manager, the team has added the veteran pitcher Dan Haren to its already loaded rotation.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that Washington Nationals manager Davey Johnson is taking steps to build a championship team for what he insists will be his last season.
lead_paragraph: In Davey Johnson’s quest to lead the Washington Nationals to a championship in his last season as a manager, the team has added the veteran pitcher Dan Haren to its already loaded rotation.

headline.seo: It Is ‘World Series or Bust’ for Nationals in Final Year of Manager Davey Johnson
